welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Nauen, Germany! Get ready to be charmed by our quaint city, known for its historical sites and picturesque landscapes. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Nauen has to offer."

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at Berlin-tegel Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Berlin-tegel Airport, mainly used for low-cost and regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Berlin Brandenburg Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Berlin Brandenburg Airport, primarily serving low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport, with a limit of 1 hour per device per day.
